other_tests.findings: A single stricture was noted in the lower part of the CBD; the two existing plastic stents were removed and a metal stent was positioned into place.
Noted an ill-defined mass at the porta hepatis and lymph node at the porta hepatis without discrete pancreatic mass seen.

Lymph node biopsy from the EUS shows a high-grade neuroendocrine tumor, with Ki-67 of ~50%, with tumor cells positive for CK7, chromogranin, and CDX-2, and negative for TTF-1, synaptophysin, and CK20.
